verses.verse: David's <S%H1732><s%> Psalm of praise. <S%H8416><s%> I will extol <S%H7311><s%> you, my God, <S%H430><s%> O king; <S%H4428><s%> and I will bless <S%H1288><s%> your name <S%H8034><s%> for ever <S%H5769><s%> and ever. <S%H5703><s%>
Every <S%H3605><s%> day <S%H3117><s%> will I bless <S%H1288><s%> you; and I will praise <S%H1984><s%> your name <S%H8034><s%> for ever <S%H5769><s%> and ever. <S%H5703><s%>
Great <S%H1419><s%> is the LORD, <S%H3068><s%> and greatly <S%H3966><s%> to be praised; <S%H1984><s%> and his greatness <S%H1420><s%> is unsearchable. <S%H369><s%> <S%H2714><s%>
One generation <S%H1755><s%> shall praise <S%H7623><s%> your works <S%H4639><s%> to another, and shall declare <S%H5046><s%> your mighty <S%H1369><s%> acts.
I will speak <S%H7878><s%> of the glorious <S%H3519><s%> honor <S%H1926><s%> of your majesty, <S%H1935><s%> and of your wondrous <S%H6381><s%> works. <S%H1697><s%>
And men shall speak <S%H559><s%> of the might <S%H5807><s%> of your terrible <S%H3372><s%> acts: and I will declare <S%H5608><s%> your greatness. <S%H1420><s%>
They shall abundantly <S%H5042><s%> utter <S%H5042><s%> the memory <S%H2143><s%> of your great <S%H7227><s%> goodness, <S%H2898><s%> and shall sing <S%H7442><s%> of your righteousness. <S%H6666><s%>
The LORD <S%H3068><s%> is gracious, <S%H2587><s%> and full of compassion; <S%H7349><s%> slow <S%H750><s%> to anger, <S%H639><s%> and of great <S%H1419><s%> mercy. <S%H2617><s%>
The LORD <S%H3068><s%> is good <S%H2896><s%> to all: <S%H3605><s%> and his tender mercies <S%H7356><s%> are over <S%H5921><s%> all <S%H3605><s%> his works. <S%H4639><s%>
All <S%H3605><s%> your works <S%H4639><s%> shall praise <S%H3034><s%> you, O LORD; <S%H3068><s%> and your saints <S%H2623><s%> shall bless <S%H1288><s%> you.
They shall speak <S%H559><s%> of the glory <S%H3519><s%> of your kingdom, <S%H4438><s%> and talk <S%H1696><s%> of your power; <S%H1369><s%>
To make known <S%H3045><s%> to the sons <S%H1121><s%> of men <S%H120><s%> his mighty <S%H1369><s%> acts, and the glorious <S%H3519><s%> majesty <S%H1926><s%> of his kingdom. <S%H4438><s%>
Your kingdom <S%H4438><s%> is an everlasting <S%H5769><s%> kingdom, <S%H4438><s%> and your dominion <S%H4475><s%> endures throughout all generations. <S%H1755><s%>
The LORD <S%H3068><s%> upholds <S%H5564><s%> all <S%H3605><s%> that fall, <S%H5307><s%> and raises <S%H2210><s%> up all <S%H3605><s%> those that be bowed <S%H3721><s%> down.
The eyes <S%H5869><s%> of all <S%H3605><s%> wait <S%H7663><s%> on you; and you give <S%H5414><s%> them their meat <S%H400><s%> in due season. <S%H6256><s%>
You open <S%H6605><s%> your hand, <S%H3027><s%> and satisfy <S%H7646><s%> the desire <S%H7522><s%> of every <S%H3605><s%> living <S%H2416><s%> thing.
The LORD <S%H3068><s%> is righteous <S%H6662><s%> in all <S%H3605><s%> his ways, <S%H1870><s%> and holy <S%H2623><s%> in all <S%H3605><s%> his works. <S%H4639><s%>
The LORD <S%H3068><s%> is near <S%H7138><s%> to all <S%H3605><s%> them that call <S%H7121><s%> on him, to all <S%H3605><s%> that call <S%H7121><s%> on him in truth. <S%H571><s%>
He will fulfill <S%H6213><s%> the desire <S%H7522><s%> of them that fear <S%H3373><s%> him: he also will hear <S%H8085><s%> their cry, <S%H7775><s%> and will save <S%H3467><s%> them.
The LORD <S%H3068><s%> preserves <S%H8104><s%> all <S%H3605><s%> them that love <S%H157><s%> him: but all <S%H3605><s%> the wicked <S%H7563><s%> will he destroy. <S%H8045><s%>

My mouth <S%H6310><s%> shall speak <S%H1696><s%> the praise <S%H8416><s%> of the LORD: <S%H3068><s%> and let all <S%H3605><s%> flesh <S%H1320><s%> bless <S%H1288><s%> his holy <S%H6944><s%> name <S%H8034><s%> for ever <S%H5769><s%> and ever. <S%H5703><s%>
